item.title:
FreeMarker template error: For "." left-hand operand: Expected a hash, but this evaluated to a sequence (wrapper: f.c.BuiltInsForSequences$chunkBI$ChunkedSequence$1): ==> post [in template "feed.ftl" at line 23, column 37]
---- FTL stack trace ("~" means nesting-related): - Failed at: ${post.title} auto-escaped [in template "feed.ftl" at line 23, column 35] ----
